title: 515: Prisoner of Azkaban Movie Commentary
itunes:title: Prisoner of Azkaban Movie Commentary
description:
This week's episode is our fifth-ever Wizarding World movie commentary! Watch Prisoner of Azkaban with the MuggleCasters, and listen as we react in real-time to everything happening. Is this movie as bad as some people say it is? What do we love and hate about it? We discuss it all as we watch!

Note: You will need your own copy of Prisoner of Azkaban in order to watch with us. We will help you sync up the movie with us at the start of the commentary track. We strongly recommend listening to this episode with your own copy of the movie. Otherwise, it may be difficult to follow along with what we're discussing.

See more of our movie commentaries on our Must-Listens page.
itunes:author: Harry Potter
dc:creator: Harry Potter
